Title: Magento Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
Description: Magento Commerce and Open Source 2.2.6 and 2.1.15 contain multiple security enhancements that help close Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and other vulnerabilities.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.1 before 2.1.15, all versions starting from 2.2 before 2.2.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.1, all versions starting from 2.1.15 before 2.2, all versions starting from 2.2.6
